sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SAMULCOTTA, a town of Hindustan, in the province of the Circars, and district of Rajamundry. Pepper grows wild on the neighbouring hills. It is situatcd on the north bank of a small river, a few miles from the sea. Long. 82. 30. E. Lat. 17. 5. N.
